A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw on a plane.  Enough to make me want to use the barf bag.  They made Luka a loser and then killed him.  Probably some kind of allegory for the race/gender obsessed dorks running Lucasfilm now.  Awful characters - e.g.. Admiral Purple Hair.  And the scene with Chewbacca and the roasted bird was taken right from the Chick-fil-A commercial where the cow makes a looks at the person eating a hamburger. Unoriginal\, disrespectful of the\, with an overkill of the Hollywood political orthodoxy.
